text: Answer: 295 Solution: Blocking factor bfr = floor (B/R) = floor(512/100) = 5 records per block Number of blocks needed for file = ceiling(r/bfr) = ceiling(50000/5) = 10000 Index record size Ri = (Key (EmpNo) + PB) = (9 + 6) = 15 bytes Index blocking factor bfri = fan-out = floor(B/Ri) = floor(512/15) = 34 Number of first-level index entries r1 = number of file blocks b = 10000 entries Number of first-level index blocks b1 = geiling(r1/bfri) = ceiling(10000/34) = 295 blocks.
